meta.article_title: April 1, 2013 - The Many Ways to Receive a Short Backspin Serve

debutant.description: Loop the serve, forehand or backhand. If you don't loop, play aggressive by pushing the serve back.
Stop the opponent from looping. Aim to push short one way and then go the other way.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Loop the serve, forehand or backhand
exercices_complementaires.description: Aim to loop the serve with topspin, forehand or backhand.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Push quick, heavy, low, deep, and wide
exercices_complementaires.description: Experiment with pushing the serve back with sidespin, especially a sidespin that breaks away from the opponent on his wide backhand side.
